title: AI Spore ‚Äì the origin story
rawTemplate:

title: From chaos to orchestrator
rawTemplate:
Day 2: We used to copy-paste code between chats, fixing one bug and breaking three. Chaos. ü§Ø

Now we have an Orchestrator: OJ (conductor), Claude (architect), Gemini (builder). Each AI has a clear role. No more random hacking ‚Äì just a controlled AI orchestra.

This same engine will power all future AISpore drops. #AI #AISpore

title: Chest mechanic ‚Äì slow reveal
rawTemplate:

title: Why we‚Äôre obsessed with automation
rawTemplate:
Day 5: We don‚Äôt want a project that dies when the founder is tired.

title: Badges & early believers
rawTemplate:
Day 6: OGs matter. Early people who bring life into the community deserve more than a simple 'gm'.

AISpore will track:
‚Ä¢ Who invites new members
‚Ä¢ Who is active when others are sleeping
‚Ä¢ Who pushes the story forward

title: No manual posting policy
rawTemplate:
Day 7: Rule inside AISpore lab:

‚ùå No manual posting as the main system
‚úÖ Everything must be pluggable into the Publisher Engine

If we need to post it often, the engine must learn it.
If it can be tracked, it will be.

We build infrastructure first ‚Äì hype comes on top. #AISpore #Infra

title: MC layered economy (sneak peek)
rawTemplate:
Day 8: The prize pool will NOT be random.

We‚Äôre designing an MC layered economy:
‚Ä¢ Different market cap levels unlock different chest events
‚Ä¢ Some stages reward holders
‚Ä¢ Some stages give exposure boosts

No promises yet ‚Äì but the logic is being designed like a real product, not a lottery. #Tokenomics

title: What can go wrong (and how we avoid it)
rawTemplate:
